plan.objective: Determine the purpose and functionality of the main.py file

tasks.task: Review the project documentation and code repository
tasks.description: Read through available documentation, comments, and commit history to understand the intended purpose of main.py

tasks.task: Analyze the file structure and imports
tasks.description: Examine the directory layout, file naming conventions, and imported modules to infer main.py's role

tasks.task: Consult with project stakeholders or team members
tasks.description: (Optional) Discuss with others involved in the project to clarify any doubts about main.py's functionality

plan.objective: Identify the programming language used in the main.py file

tasks.description: Verify if it matches a known Python extension (.py)
Look for characteristic Python structures like indentation, print statements or import declarations

plan.objective: Write necessary code to complete main.py based on its intended functionality
